snippet: The injury to Robert Griffin III has cast doubt over his availability next season and also called into question whether his dynamic style of play can, or should, be continued when he returns.
abstract: Injury for which Washington Redskins quarterback Robert Griffin III underwent surgery casts doubt over his availability in 2013, and calls into question whether his dynamic play style should be continued when he returns.
lead_paragraph: The injury to Robert Griffin III has cast doubt over his availability next season and also called into question whether his dynamic style of play can, or should, be continued when he returns.

headline.seo: Redskins’ Griffin Has Knee Surgery Amid Questions on Future
headline.main: Questions of Strategy as Griffin Has Surgery
headline.print_headline: Questions of Strategy As Griffin Has Surgery
